1.0.name: wordpress/daily-crowdsource-news
1.0.description:
Keep your site content fresh by showing the hottest new headlines in the crowdsourcing industry, from the #1 site for crowdsourcing news, The Daily Crowdsource. This sidebar widget shows the latest headlines, with accompanying images.

Headlines include:

  • Crowdsourcing news
  • Crowdfunding news
  • CEO Thought Leader insights (Crowd Leaders)
  • Open Innovation news
  • Case Studies
  • Video Interviews
  • Podcasts
  • Exclusive Insider Info
  • Community News

Customize:

  • How many headlines to show
  • Display as a list, or graphically (image is more prominent)
  • Option to include tweet & like buttons
  • Accepts your current theme's look & CSS is fully customizable

If you
